name: 張瑋倫
objective: This course provides an overview of AI and its role in business transformation. The purpose is to improve understanding of AI and being used in the industries. The brief technical overview of AI will be covered such as big data, data mining, machine learning, etc. The objectives are to learn how digital technologies will be applied to various business settings and how to adapt business strategy and operation in the era of digital transformation. Finally, learning how to utilize AI as the source of competitive advantage.
schedule:
W1: Orientation
W2: AI for Business Course Intro  (Is AI a General Purpose Technology?) 
W3: Intro to Big Data and AI
W4: Understanding the use of AI in business (chap 2&3 of T2)
W5: AI (Machine Learning) (chap 4&5 of T1)
W6: Business Applications of Machine Learning (chap 3 of T1)
W7: OFF
W8: Psychology of algorithm (chap 6&7 of T1)
W9: AI-driven strategy (chap 4 of T2)
W10: Midterm week
W11: Building and Investing in AI-Based Businesses (R4)
W12: Introduction to Business Analytics (R5, R6, R7)
W13: AI tasks, organizational structures, and business processes (chap 5 of T2)
W14: Jobs and skills in a world of smart machines (chap 6 of T2)
W15: Risks with AI (chap 10 of T1)
W16: Organizational, social, and ethical implications (chap 8 of T2)
W17: Final Presentation
